N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 830.2 - Credit period for additional charges

State Regulations

Where a common carrier by motor vehicle has relinquished
possession of freight and collected the amount of tariff charges represented in
a freight bill presented by it as the total amount of such charges, and another
freight bill for additional charges is thereafter presented to the shipper, the
carrier may extend credit in the amount of such additional charges for a period
of 30 calendar days, to be computed from the first 12:00 midnight following
presentation of the subsequently presented freight bill. Notes
